dict.string: Dr. Mandal joined the VA Palo Alto Healthcare as lead Polytrauma Network Site physiatrist at the Livermore division in 2009.
She graduated from Tufts University School of Medicine in Boston, and completed her training in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation at the University of California in Los Angeles (UCLA).
She works with TBI patients, ranging from mild to severe, OEF/OIF as well as Vietnam/Korean/Gulf war veterans.
